channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Advert attached to lampost, 2nd July
item.description:
A private company is using the lamppost to display advertising which is blocking the other signage.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cantwell Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abondoned bikes, 2nd July
item.description:
Hi. These bikes have been left here for over two years and not moved. They are taking up the useful bike parking and should be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Avondale Rise, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: In the corner of Anglesea Road and Haydens Close, 2nd July
item.description:
Abandoned car with windows open and alarm intermittently going off. Disable blue badge in the the car on the dashboard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haydens Close, Poverest, London

item.title: Multiple Offensive Stickers found on The Cut, 2nd July
item.description:
Multiple offensive stickers found on several lamppost throughout The Cut. Example attached. Please can you inspect all lamppost and remove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77 - 81, The Cut, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping - again, 2nd July
item.description:
A sofa has been dumped in Durfey Place. This spot is constantly used as an illegal flytipping space. Please do something to avoid this repeating issue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Durfey Place, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Taking up limited parking spaces for weeks without being moved, 2nd July
item.description:
Car being reported for the 3rd time since April 25 Parked outside house no 21 got moved Parked outside house no 4 got moved Now parked outside house no 51 Owner just moves the car to a different space in the road which is very limited on parking space!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of dog mess across playground, 2nd July
item.description:
Loads of dog meds across playground area. Needs immediate attention. Too many photos to upload. PLEASE NOTE: this is a SOUTHWARK-OWNED playground.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Surrey Square, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continuous flytipping, 2nd July
item.description:
No sooner has some be cleared, more gets dumped. Longer it remains, the more will arrive. Dangerous items and children walk along here

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Elswick Road, Ladywell, London

item.title: Black BMW no plates Evry Road, 2nd July
item.description:
The car has been sat out with no plates on a public road for a week, it is not road worthy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pollard Walk, North Cray, London

item.title: Dangerous tree, 2nd July
item.description:
Fern tree coming onto public highway- she has said that it is dangerous and poked her in the head when she walked past- needs to be cut back. Outside 18 manor way
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Glenhurst Avenue, Bexley, London

item.title: Large mirror left on pavement outside 74 Wellington Gardens, 2nd July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Gardens, Charlton, London

item.title: Problem tree, 2nd July
item.description:
